text: Piotr Pawłowski (19 August 1925 - 27 February 2012) was a Polish actor. He appeared in 45 films and television shows between 1958 and 1995. ==Selected filmography== * Kwiecień (1961) * Pharaoh (1966) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1925 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:People from Września County
title: Piotr Pawłowski (actor)
